Follow
View all 33 employees
Report this company
About us
Since 1995, InsideOut Literary Arts has helped over 65,000 Detroit youth build their literary and academic skills through creative writing. By working with professional writers, students are inspired and equipped to think critically, create bravely and share their voices with the world.
InsideOut is Detroit’s largest and oldest literary non-profit, serving more than 100 classrooms and community sites annually through a unique school-based Writer-in-Residence program and Citywide Poets, our award-winning afterschool program. From hosting a statewide youth poetry festival to partnering with celebrated cultural institutions like the Detroit Institute of Arts, InsideOut also provides young people opportunities to share their voices through community events.
In recognition of our ability to foster and empower authentic youth voice, the White House awarded InsideOut the highest honor in youth arts programming, the National Arts and Humanities Youth Program Award, presented by Michelle Obama in 2009. InsideOut is widely recognized as one of the nation’s premiere writers-in-the-schools programs and has been featured on PBS NewsHour and performed on the stage of the Kennedy Center.

title: InsideOut Literary Arts
text:
InsideOut Literary Arts | Mightycause
Dashboard Mightycause LogoSearch Log in InsideOut Literary Arts A nonprofit organization Donate Fundraise Share this organization Since 1995, InsideOut Literary Arts has helped Detroit’s youth build their literary and academic skills through creative writing. By working with professional writers, students learn to think broadly, create bravely and share their voices with the wider world.Why does learning to write poetry make a difference in a young person’s life?Because students learn:
Critical thinking and problem-solving skills
How to improve their writing
Positive and constructive ways to communicate their authentic feelings
Our programs also help students build self-confidence, foster their artistic excellence, create community, and elevate youth voice in Detroit and beyond.InsideOut’s Transformative Programs include:Writer-In-Residence ProgramOur in-school creative writing program places professional writers in elementary, middle, and high school classrooms throughout Detroit to provide intensive weekly writing workshops. Every student is featured in a professionally published literary anthology at every school, every single year.Citywide PoetsInsideOut’s award-winning afterschool program provides teens with weekly creative writing workshops, publication, and performance opportunities. In this literary community, teens learn their words are powerful and embrace creative expression as a tool for self-development and civic engagement.Community ProgrammingFrom hosting community open mics to partnering with celebrated cultural institutions like the Detroit Institute of Arts, InsideOut provides young people with opportunities to share their voices and create community connections.As Detroit’s largest and oldest literary non-profit, InsideOut now serves more than 100 classrooms and community sites annually. Our professional writers continue to help students experiment with words and learn that each unique voice matters – that there is power in “bringing the inside out.” Please consider investing in youth voices in Detroit and beyond.To learn more, visit https://insideoutdetroit.org.Featured Campaigns event Write-A-Thon 2023$42,922 Raised Campaigns supporting this organization Fundraiser Suma's InsideOut Write-A-Thon Fundraiser$3,570 Fundraiser InsideOut's Summer Fundraiser$8,316 Fundraiser Mindy's Write-A-Thon Fundraiser$1,835 Fundraiser My InsideOut Write-A-Thon Fundraiser$1,220 Fundraiser phoenix's InsideOut Write-A-Thon Fundraiser$600 Fundraiser My InsideOut Write-A-Thon Fundraiser$1,650More Organization Data Summary 0Summary Organization name InsideOut Literary Arts Tax id (EIN) 31-1428704 Categories Arts & Culture, Education, Children & Family Address 5201 Cass Ave, Prentis Hall, 3rd Floor DETROIT, MI 48202 Email 0john@insideoutdetroit.org Website 0https://insideoutdetroit.org/Show moreManage this organization Donate Products Resources Causes blog support pricing terms & privacy facebook twitter instagram youtube Mightycause LogoHow can we help?Browse help topicsContact ChatClose
